title: The Office Podcast Coming From Jenna Fischer, Angela Kinsey
text:
Photo: Getty Images

This spring will mark the 15th anniversary of The Office, and Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey are getting the fans a gift to celebrate. According to Variety, the once-and-forever Dunder Mifflin employees Pam and Angela are starting a podcast called Office Ladies, in which they will share stories from their time filming the hit series and discuss their favorite episodes. The two actresses are very close in real life, so they’ll also just talk about being friends. “It seemed like a great time to share our stories and behind-the-scenes trivia with fans,” Fischer said in a statement. “Besides talking about The Office, you can also hear us chat a little about our lives, our Target runs together, our friendship through the years.” Office Ladies will be an Earwolf podcast, and it will start streaming on October 16. We know what Billie Eilish will be listening to as she tours the world.
description: Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey are starting a podcast called Office Ladies, in which they will share behind the scenes stories and anecdotes from their time making The Office.
